divs: Sighting DetailsOn May 3 was coming out of college by nine, waiting watching could cross the highway Schist near the post of the State Highway Police Lapa PR, when I looked to the south, a triangular object, not proves caraceristicas tickets for lights aircraft blink in yellow and red, and is common on nights with clear skies to observe the passage of aircraft in the region and unblinking lights moving slowly before disappearing, not like the planes that disappears at the end of the horizon, also had problems communication for a few minutes, the phones did not work presenting the message no network signal. I realized I could be a triangle flying when they commented about the "sighting" in Curitiba on 13 May this year, a few days after what I saw, do not know if he saw any more, because it is common time always be clear to cloudy nights watching the stars have a few weeks during the year, but since half the time the night sky is overcast during the year.
